类 Java6BDDSoftAssertions

  • public class Java6BDDSoftAssertions
extends Java6AbstractBDDSoftAssertions
    BDD-style Android-compatible soft assertions. Duplicated from BDDSoftAssertions.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.5.0 / 3.5.0
    另请参阅:
    BDDSoftAssertions

      • assertAll

        public void assertAll()
        Verifies that no proxied assertion methods have failed.
        抛出:
        SoftAssertionError - if any proxied assertion objects threw
